law.text: All moneys collected under the provisions of KRS 149.610 to 149.680, including such as may be contributed or paid by the federal government or any other public or private agency, organization or individual, shall be placed in the State Treasury to the credit of a revolving, trust or agency fund account for use by the Energy and Environment Cabinet in carrying out the purposes of KRS 149.610 to 149.680.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 173, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 7, effective June 16, 1960.
